about_the_game:
Enjoy the thrilling dark investigation "Mystical Riddles: Ghostly Park DLC"! Mini-games, puzzles and hidden objects await you! Try to find all the hidden objects in the four additional locations. You'll get to visit an abandoned house of fear, as well as explore Nicholas' lab, where you're sure to find something that can clear things up! There's also a lot waiting for you in the fortune teller's tent and the cultists' bar!

In the new locations, you can learn new details about the characters and uncover all the secrets that will help you clear up the whole situation. Unlock new achievements after completing all the quests!

🧩 VISIT AN ABANDONED HOUSE OF TERROR!
Skeletons, vampires, ghosts, and other undead of all classes and breeds. Will you be able to find among all these ghouls something that can shed light on the mysteries? Solve all the puzzles and find all the hidden items in the abandoned house of horror!

🧩 TAKE A LOOK AROUND NICHOLAS' LAB!
Among all the vials, tweezers, and other scientific utensils, a skull catches your eye. Whose is it? Here you can find a lot of interesting things, thanks to which you will get closer to the clue.

🧩 EXPLORE THE FORTUNE TELLER'S TENT!
Have you ever been involved with esotericism? If not, it's up to you to explore the fortune teller's tent. Examine everything thoroughly, but be careful with the artifacts, because they might be cursed!

🧩 COME TO THE CULTISTS' BAR!
Fancy a little break, and maybe a juice? No way! This is no time to sit around! It's up to you to pay a visit there and find out exactly what the place is hiding!

Are you ready to find all the carefully hidden objects and solve all the puzzles? Start your journey and discover all the achievements!
